Question
========

If a pure coin is tossed three times, then the probability that three the same side comes up three times (i.e., three times heads or three times tails) is equal to:

Answerlist
----------

* 8%
* 16%
* 25%
* 50%

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 8%: Incorrect
* 16%: Incorrect
* 25%: Correct
* 50%: Incorrect
